parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which to list data source run activities.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source run.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListDataSourceRunActivities action.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when data source run activity was created.

nested_items.name: dataAssetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the asset included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: dataAssetStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the asset included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: dataSourceRunId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the data source for the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: database
nested_items.description: The database included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorDetail
nested_items.description: The details of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: errorType
nested_items.description: The type of the error message that is returned if the operation cannot be successfully completed.

nested_items.name: projectId
nested_items.description: The project ID included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: technicalDescription
nested_items.description: The technical description included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: technicalName
nested_items.description: The technical name included in the data source run activity.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when data source run activity was updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of activities is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of activities, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListDataSourceRunActivities to list the next set of activities.
